thread.title: Barry Hyman

author: Barry Hyman
title: Barry Hyman
text: I ordered a Gaggia Classic from WholeLatteLove a few weeks ago. The price was great, the delivery was remarkably fast, the service (there was nothing wrong with the machine but there was one thing I did wrong during the setup) was lucid, fast-responding, and completely helpful, and now my home espresso and Americanos are as good as at any coffeehouse anywhere!
